name: Cloud247
description:
Cloud247 is a Cloud Computing and IT company aiming to bring Cloud revolution Canada and adjoining regions. Apart from varying types of cloud computing related services, Cloud247 has different teams with different IT expertise to serve Canadian industries and businesses.
Key Services
Cloud247 offers a range of cloud services and IT services including:

website development


Data-driven and dynamic web application designing and programming


Native iOS apps development for iPhone and iPad like iOS devices


Native Android application development for Android smartphones and tablets


Cross-platform mobile app development for a wide range of audience using various computing devices


A wide range of Cloud Computing services such as:

Different types of cloud packages including public, private, and hybrid cloud services


Cloud migration


Cloud adoption


IaaS


PaaS


DaaS


SaaS


Cloud hosting & so on



Hire dedicated resources like designers, programmers, QA professionals, and marketers
